entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:49 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 08:49 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 08:49 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
